name: Healthyfied Pork Nilaga
description: Indulge in the comforting flavors of our Healthyfied Pork Nilaga, a classic Filipino stew reimagined to fit a low-carb, low-sugar lifestyle without compromising on taste. This heartwarming dish, enriched with tender pork, vibrant green cabbage, and sweet pumpkin, offers a perfect balance of nutrition and flavor. Ideal for health-conscious individuals looking for high-sodium yet healthy recipes.
recipeIngredient: 300 g Pork / Boston Butt, Raw (夾心肉, 生)

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Pork / Boston Butt under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the green cabbage and dice the pumpkin into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Mince the garlic and slice the onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, bring the 2 liters of water to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the pork to the boiling water, reduce heat to medium, and simmer for 45 minutes or until the pork is tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Incorporate the garlic, onion, green cabbage, and pumpkin into the pot. Season with fish sauce, salt, and black pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Continue to simmer for an additional 20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust the seasoning as needed, and serve hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
